page.title: 03THE RECTOR
page.content: {The Rector} The hardworking Rector of St. Mary's has the same problems in this community that most rectors of the Church of England have everywhere, acting as pastor to many more people than in previous generations. The Church is used for weddings, baptisms and funerals and for many people that is the extent of their church going. The Rector is trying to make the church and church going more attractive to young people. Apart from the regular church services there are many groups organised to encourage people to meet together. There is a Mothers' Union branch, five House Groups for Bible studies, three youth groups called Explorers, Pathfinders and CYFA. There is a pram service for young mothers & babies, a reguar Sunday School & monthly family service
